data.title: The Sail at Marina Bay
data.text:
The Sail @ Marina Bay seamlessly connects to the heart of the city and sets a new benchmark for a truly integrated lifestyle to live, work and play.

This exceptional development is strategically located in the New Downtown at Marina Bay, the Marina Bay Financial Centre (MBFC), Raffles Place and near notable landmarks such as The Esplanade - Theatres on the Bay, Merlion Park, Singapore Flyer, Marina Bay Sands Integrated Resort, and the Gardens by the Bay (total 94 ha).

The Sail @ Marina Bay also boasts of a direct underground access to the Raffles Place and Downtown MRT stations. Access to all other recreational, functional amenities and services is only a stoneâs throw away.
